title: Mayura Jhumka - Peacock Drop Earrings with Coral and Neelam
features: Exquisitely crafted peacock motif at the stud with diamond pavé setting. The design showcases a delightful combination of traditional Jhumka elements with modern gemstone arrangements. Coral ‘flower’ and Tanzanite bead dangles add a touch of whimsy and color.
occasions: Perfect for both festive celebrations (like Sankranthi
Diwali) and contemporary gatherings. A unique statement piece suitable for cocktail parties
or adding a touch of elegance to everyday wear.
description: A striking fusion of traditional South Indian design with modern gemstone appeal. The handcrafted peacock design symbolizes beauty and prosperity. The combination of vibrant Coral, Tanzanite, and sparkling Diamonds makes this a truly unique and eye-catching piece. High-quality craftsmanship and ethically sourced gemstones ensure enduring value.
